Add these badges to your README.md to show build status and code coverage:


## Combined Badge Section

Here's a recommended badge section for your README.md:

```markdown
# faketandem

[![CI](https://github.com/jwoglom/faketandem/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/jwoglom/faketandem/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/jwoglom/faketandem/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/jwoglom/faketandem)
[![Go Report Card](https://goreportcard.com/badge/github.com/jwoglom/faketandem)](https://goreportcard.com/report/github.com/jwoglom/faketandem)
[![Go Version](https://img.shields.io/github/go-mod/go-version/jwoglom/faketandem)](https://github.com/jwoglom/faketandem)
[![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/jwoglom/faketandem)](https://github.com/jwoglom/faketandem/blob/main/LICENSE)

Tandem insulin pump simulator for testing and development.
```

## Custom Status Badge

For specific branches or workflows:

```markdown
[![Branch CI](https://github.com/jwoglom/faketandem/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg?branch=claude/plan-pump-simulator-5Lvdd)](https://github.com/jwoglom/faketandem/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
```

## Viewing Status

**GitHub Actions UI:**
1. Go to https://github.com/jwoglom/faketandem/actions
2. View workflow runs and their status
3. Click on individual runs to see detailed logs

**Codecov Dashboard:**
1. Go to https://codecov.io/gh/jwoglom/faketandem
2. View coverage reports by file/package
3. Track coverage trends over time

**Go Report Card:**
1. Go to https://goreportcard.com/report/github.com/jwoglom/faketandem
2. View automated code quality assessment
3. See specific linter suggestions
